summary: The Portable Ultrasound Reimbursement Equity Act of 2025 aims to amend the Social Security Act to provide Medicare coverage for portable ultrasound transportation and setup services. It mirrors the existing payment structure for portable X-ray services, ensuring equitable payment for these services. The bill specifies the Secretary of Health and Human Services will establish requirements for suppliers, similar to those for portable X-ray services. The amendments are slated to take effect January 1, 2027.
